name: Those darn Feds
description:
This game is a topdown 2d game, where you find feds hiding in the grass and neutralise them with your flamethrower

If you beat this game with no deaths, you get a gold star!

If the web browser isn't working right for some reason, you should switch to the executable version, but I didn't have time to make it for other OS than windows

Controls

You walk around with WASD

You aim with your mouse, and shoot by holding left-click

You can also dash with space

Credits

Programming - Mimijackz

Art - Mimijackz

Sound - Mimijackz

Fonts:

FFF Forward by FontsForFlash

kongtext by codeman38
